entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -44.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 06:49 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -44.1°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -60

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 41.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 41. Wind chill minus 61 this morning and minus 52 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 45.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 45. Wind chill near minus 62. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
